# === Android Studio default ignore ===
.idea/
.gradle/
local.properties
*.iml
*.hprof

# === Build outputs ===
/build/
/app/build/
/*/build/

# === APK, AAB, ZIP files ===
*.apk
*.aab
*.zip

# === Misc ===
captures/
output.json
*.log

# === OS generated files ===
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# === Git LFS ===
.gitattributes
